name: Destroy of autonomy.
description:
You have the choice.  Every part of your character is essential to pass an obstacle and achieve the level in less time. But you must choose…. which part to remove.

Adventure game in a procedural level, sacrifying a capacity at each try.  Done during the RandomNameJam 2019, with optional themes « random, a wall, minimalist » included.

Controls Reminder :

Arrows : move horizontally & vertically 

X : Dashing ( kill Leaf enemy)

C : Screech (afraid Mushroom enemy)

Space : Jump (across Rocks)

Playable with Xbox controller : left joystick = moves, A = jump, B = dash, Y = screech 

Game made by : Quy Diep, Francois Félisiak, Lisa Liagre, and  Gaëtan Maret.
